item.title: INFO 270: Calling Bullshit: Data Reasoning in a Digital World
item.description: Introduction to bullshit Spotting bullshit The natural ecology of bullshit Causality Statistical traps Visualization Big data Publication bias Predatory publishing and scientific misconduct The ethics of calling bullshit. Fake news Refuting bullshit INFO 270: Calling Bullshit: Data Reasoning in a Digital World.
